A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Spoiler Alert:
I can look past the jokes\, Finn and roses subplot and the complete lack of rey's training. I can look past how they handled Luke's character. What's worse is that Luke is now dead and can't even redeem himself. 

I've been a star wars fan for 20 years and I can't believe Disney would do this to Luke..... Anyway the rest of the movie was fine. Yes Rey is a "nobody"\, Snoke was not given a backstory but it was very entertaining and definitely had some of the coolest lightsaber and space battles I've ever seen.

RIP LUKE
